document_data.name: Spinach
document_data.mainbody: '''Spinach''' was a variety of a green leafy vegetable found in some areas of [[Faerûn]] and primarily used as food.
document_data.Availability: Spinach was served at the [[Elfsong Tavern]] of [[Baldur's Gate]].
document_data.Usages:
Spinach was used as a type of [[pie]] filling in [[Cormyr]]

[[Runsun]] was a variety of common trail food—a pie made with meat cooked in spinach-and-[[mint]] or spinach-and-hot-[[pepper]] simmer sauce.
document_data.History:
In the late 14{{th}} century [[DR]], [[Dradeel's Vegetable Surprise]], made with spinach, was a recipe developed by [[Dradeel]], a mad [[elvish]] [[mage]] and a survivor of [[Balduran]]'s final voyage to the isles of [[Anchorome]].

In the {{YearlinkName|1492}}, [[Emmeline Hallowleaf]], mother to [[Shadowheart]], one of the [[Absolute Adversaries]], knew a recipe for [[Feast Day Cheese Bake]] made with various vegetables, including spinach, which she may have had shared with her daughter once the war with [[The Absolute]] was over.
